product_name: Brooks Epiphany Stretch Shorts II - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The popular women's Brooks Epiphany Stretch Shorts II have breathable mesh and a comfortable liner for cool comfort. A nice treat? The waistband rolls down to show off a contrasting color.
